attributes.action: To give from 16+ the same basic wage as a 28+
attributes.additional_details:
By increasing the wage it has many benefits that can help prevent crime. It gives our next a chance and a choice to want to work as they have many responsibilities as young people.in England young people are part of gangs and crimes and all sorts . 
I've also noticed how business whether big or small have miss treated and took advantage of young people because their young . I myself have managed a team young and people of an older generation and their has been cause for
attributes.background: To give 16+ the same basic wage as 28+ and increase basic in UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555249
